name: Projection
desc:
Within the range of the spell, you can create an image of anything that can fully fit within the area. You can create one thing, or multiple things that all fit within the area. The image appears to be real, and obscures or hides creatures accordingly, but interacting with the image reveals that it is an illusion.

A creature that is suspicious of the illusion can make a Knowledge saving throw during their turn. On a success, the illusion appears transparent to them.

The spell ends if you cast this spell again.
empower: Range increased to Self (15 foot radius).
